What is a subsystem?
Subsystems are an extension of the Skapa design system, introduced to meet the
specific demands of product teams, designing and developing for a specific market,
domain or touchpoint. A Subsystem focuses on the unique needs of a specific area
while aligning with the overarching Skapa design principles, visual language, and
standards. In short, some components are too specific to be inherited by the main IKEA
design system, but are still very commonly used in their respective areas. In such cases,
we enable teams to create a subsystem.
How to add a Subsystem library in
